item.title: Installing Maya On Pop!OS and Ubuntu 20.10
item.description: I’ve recently spent some time trying to make Maya 2020 work on PopOS 20.10. I was helping a friend, luckily I have no use for Maya myself anymore. But since this might be helpful for someone, I thought I’d share. I was using PopOS but all the steps except the last one should apply to ubuntu 20.10 too. Maya running on Ubuntu 20.10 Autodesk provides a GUIDE for installing Maya 2020 on Ubuntu 20.
